module.name: resource_management_characterized

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information that may be assigned to managed resources, such as identifiers, approvals, effectivity, etc.

inscope.li: Information about defined and observed states.

uof.description: This unit of functionality provides the capability to represent resource management characteristics.
